metadata.dc:title: Hemodialysis and extracorporal system biocompatibility
metadata.dc:description: The appearance of hemodialysis has been a great advance in the Medicine. However, it is a device no exent of complications, because the contact of blood with & foreing material leads to a whole systemic reactions. This phenomenon is known as bioincompatibility. Current evidence suggests that biocompatibility characteristic influences the long-term clinical outcome of chronic hemodialysis patients. In this paper the pathogenic mechanism and the clinical impact of the hemodialysis biocompatibility are reviewed (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Purroy, A
Álvarez, ML
metadata.dc:title: Hemodiálisis y biocompatibilidad del sistema extracorpóreo
